WorkItem.Description:
In a odt file, if a cell content text with style, this code don't return all the cell value :
```
$sheet->getCell("F3")->getValue()
```

Below, the XML part of the incriminated cell from content.xml :
```
<table:table-cell table:style-name="ce39" office:value-type="string">
<text:p>
Respecter le bien-Ãªtre
<text:span text:style-name="T1">des</text:span>
<text:span text:style-name="T2"></text:span>
<text:span text:style-name="T1">animaux</text:span>
<text:span text:style-name="T3">,</text:span>
<text:span text:style-name="T4"></text:span>
c'est :
</text:p>
</table:table-cell>
```
WorkItem.Summary: OOCalc read not all the cell value
